statements: UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', job_location = 'San Francisco' WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_description = 'Looking for a talented web developer', date_posted = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-987654321cba';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title='Software Engineer', job_type='Full-time' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_location='New York', job_description='Join our innovative team!', date_posted='2022-10-01 15:00:00' WHERE id='fd890e82-87ad-4c05-8391-e1ad33ccc124';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_location='Remote' WHERE job_id=1;
UPDATE applicants SET application_date='2022-01-15' WHERE applicant_id=2;
UPDATE job_postings SET job_location='Remote', job_type='Full Time' WHERE job_id=101;
UPDATE applicants SET application_date='2022-01-31', applicant_name='Alice Smith' WHERE applicant_id=201;

UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', job_description = 'Seeking a skilled software engineer with experience in Java.', job_location = 'San Francisco', job_type = 'Full-time' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE applications SET status = 'Under Review', application_date = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Senior Software Engineer', job_location = 'San Francisco' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE applicants SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', resume = 'Updated resume text' WHERE id = 'abcd1234-5678-efgh-9101-ijklmnopqrst';
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title='Senior Developer', job_location='Remote' WHERE job_id=1;
UPDATE applicant_information SET applicant_email='john.doe@example.com', applicant_phone='123-456-7890' WHERE applicant_id=5;
UPDATE job_postings SET job_description = 'Updated description', job_location = 'Remote' WHERE job_id = 1;
UPDATE application_status SET status = 'Accepted' WHERE application_id = 1;
UPDATE job_postings SET job_title = 'Software Engineer' WHERE job_id = 1;
UPDATE applications SET status = 'Under Review' WHERE applicant_id = 5 AND job_id = 2;
